SAINT.Name: St. Metrophanes the first Patriarch of Constantinople (+ c.326)
Venerable Methodius the Abbot of Pashnoshsk (+1392)
Holy Martyrs Frontasius, Severinus, Severianus and Silanus (1st C)
Hieromartyr Astius the Bishop of Dyrrachium (2nd C)
St. Zosimus, bishop of Babylon in Egypt (6th C)
New Hieromartyr Joannicius, Metropolitan of Montenegro and the Littoral (+1945)
Sts Martha and Mary, the sisters of Lazarus (1st C)
Venerable Eleazar and Nazarius, Wonderworkers of Olonets (15th C)
New Hieromartyrs Andronicus, Archbishop of Perm, Basil, Archbishop of Chernigov, and those with them (+1918)
